title: Hungry Jack
description: Something stalks the woods of No-Man's Hollow; a creature not fully man nor beast; with a devilish talent for misdirection and a seemingly unquenchable HUNGER for vengeance... and also human flesh. Follow this tale of primal evil along the faultline of the human soul; between past and present, wilderness and civilization, sanity and madness; but think carefully before you do. It is much easier to learn than it is to forget...
author: Ransom Kane
